## Codebook (updated 2025-11-09)

### Columns renamed
- Subject → Splitted to Hospital and ID
- 1_Age → Age
- RBC.age.group → Storage_age_group
- Median.RBC.Age → Median_storage_age_group
- FamHx → Family_history
- T stage → Tumor_stage
- PreopPSA → Preoperative_PSA
- PreopTherapy → Preoperative_therapy
- Units → Allogeneic_units
- AnyAdjTherapy → Adjuvant_therapy
- AdjRadTherapy → Adjuvant_radiation_therapy
- SGS → Surgical_gleason_score

### Columns deleted
- AA

### New columns

| Variable                     | Position | Description                                                            | Codes / values        |
|:---------------------------- | -------: | :--------------------------------------------------------------------- | :-------------------- |
| PVol                         |      17  | Indicator showing PVol measures; type: **numeric**                     | range: 19–274         |
| TVol                         |      18  | Indicator showing TVol measures; type: **categorical**                 | levels: 1, 2, 3       |
| PVol_HighLow                 |      19  | Indicator showing PVol over/under 100; type: **categorical**           | "High", "Low"         |
| Recurrence2                  |      20  | Indicator showing recurrence; type: **categorical**                    | "Yes", "No"           |
| TotalTherapy                 |      21  | Received preoperative or adjuvant radiation therapy; **categorical**   | 0, 1                  |
| unit_norm                    |      23  | Helper for PVol_highlow; **categorical**                               | "High", "Low"         |
| ttr_num                      |      24  | Helper variable; **numeric**                                           | —                     |
| TimeToRecurrence_days_new    |      25  | Days to recurrence; **numeric**                                        | range: 2–725          |
| TimeToRecurrence_weeks_new   |      26  | Weeks to recurrence; **numeric**                                       | range: 0–104          |
